Tinashe M. Tapera {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Summary

Data Scientist with a focus on quantitative data analysis and computational techniques for psychology and neuroscience research. My mission is to study, understand, and predict human behaviour using advanced computational, data mining, and machine learning tools. Expert R and proficient python programmer, with significant experience in a wide range of domains from clinical psychology/neuroscience, to  people analytics, and industrial/organizational psychology.
